name: Bowgun Defense
description:
Beat the rushing enemy to the castle and protect your fairly!
Let’s play a Battery Shooting Game!

* Game will be over when the enemy reaches to the castle wall!
* Your weapon power will be up when fairly gets in the castle!
* Your weapon power will be down if you knock your fairly down!

Beast the high score and protect your fairly!

* As you get more scores, you will get experience points. Your rank will be up!
* Get new weapon when your rank is up!?
* Fight with accessory combinations, like “score up” “Weapon power up”!
